statement.p: In the model \displaystyle{A}={1700}\cdot{\left({2}^{{\frac{{t}}{{36}}}}\right)} what is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements.

solution.p: The percent increase/decrease is calculated from \displaystyle{2}^{{\frac{{1}}{{36}}}}\approx{1.0194406437021}. Because this is bigger than 1, this is a percent increase and the result is \displaystyle{1.0194406437021}-{1}={0.019440643702145}\approx{0.019} and the percent is 1.9.
We round to 2 significant digits because the measurement (exponent) had 2 significant digits.
